title: Manga Grimm Douwa: Hontou wa Zankoku na Hansel to Gretel
original_name: まんがグリム童話 本当は残酷なヘンゼルとグレーテル
sinopse:
1. Hansel to Gretel
2. Dorobou no Omuko-san
3. Shiren no Seii
4. Endoumame no Ohime-sama
5. Banken Rosalie
6. Hoshi no Kinka
7. Ryuuguu-ke no Zankoku-hime
   8-9. Watashi no Shuui ni wa Fushigi ga Ippai
